metadata.synopsis: Doubting artist is cowering because something potentially harmfull is happening. He don't want to talk until it is resolved.

0.speaker: Oskar Fevras
0.text: Shitting hells, will this never end?!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The artist has been freed by the player, He is leaving the cave, but on the path he feels threatened by something

1.speaker: Oskar Fevras
1.context: InternalNodeContext: All the Zhent around the artist are dead. Now he is threatened by something.

2.speaker: Oskar Fevras
2.text: Well?! You bought me, so save me! Please!
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The player bought the artist. Now, the artist feel threatened by something.

3.speaker: Oskar Fevras
3.text: I'm, uh - I'm sure you have more pressing concerns than talking to me.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player entered peacefully the hideout. The artist is threatend by something : almost surely a fight between player and zhent erupted.

4.speaker: Oskar Fevras
4.text: Gods, oh gods - this isn't happening.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Zhent are fleeing to tha back of the cave. Traps are active around the artist and are going to go off soon.
